original_title: The Force That Through the Green Fire Fuels the Flower
overview: The Force That Through The Green Fire Fuels The Flower, a contemporary silent film follows a man through a journey of memories in the course of one night. During one drunken night at a bar, vivid flashbacks of his life come back to him making him realize that memories may appear in unexpected forms.
title: The Force That Through the Green Fire Fuels the Flower
